question: Which Indian bureaucrat, who is also the chairman of Public Enterprises Selection Board (PESB) has been appointed as the Secretary to the Indian President Ramnath Kovind?
explanation:
The present Chairperson of the Public Enterprises Selection Board (PESB) and veteran bureaucrat Kapil Dev Tripathi, has been appointed as the Secretary to the Indian President Ramnath Kovind, as per the recent notification of the Ministry of Personnel, Public Grievances and Pensions.
Mr.K.D.Tripathi is a retired IAS officer (1980 batch) of Assam-Meghalaya cadre. The Appointments Committee of the Cabinet has approved the appointment on contract basis, until the tenure of the President.
